name: My Darling
description:
My Darling  is a free visual novel where you spend time with Takuya, your lover. The story begins as the main character (the player) is back from job. Greeted by the smile of Takuya, you're ready to have a nice evening.

Well, as you guess, the plot is about a love story.

This is a short visual novel (about 15 minutes of gameplay) made with Ren'py engine. The original language is French but I translated the game in English for English speakers.

Warning : This game contains themes that may shock a sensitive audience.
